meta.name: Call Point Stopper
meta.heroTitle: Inexpensive Cover with Spring Loaded Hinge
meta.heroDescription: The Call Point Stopper is a UV-stabilised polycarbonate cover which protects a wide range of electrical switches and call points, without restricting legitimate operation. The Call Point Stopper is ideal for shopping centres, hotels, schools, colleges, hospitals, nursing homes and all public buildings where there is a risk of accidental activation.
